scripts.preDockerBuild: docker rmi next:1 || docker build -t next:1 .
scripts.DockerBuild: docker stop next:1 || docker rm next:1 || docker run -d --restart=always --name next -p 9000:3000 next:1 || exit
scripts.postDockerBuild: node index.js && docker cp next:/app/.next/static  %CD%/qiniu/_next && node upload.js
scripts.preDockerBuildMac: docker rmi next || docker build -t next:1 .
scripts.postDockerBuildMac: node index.js && docker cp next:/app/.next/static  $PWD/qiniu/_next && node upload.js
scripts.test: docker build -t next:1 . && docker save -o next.tar next:1
scripts.prePush: docker save -o nextBlog.tar next:1 && scp %CD%/nextBlog.tar root@47.111.168.59:/home/www/next
scripts.prePushMac: docker save -o nextBlog.tar next:1 && scp $PWD/nextBlog.tar root@47.111.168.59:/home/www/next && rm -rf nextBlog.tar
